title: Madeira: An Erotic Journey: Parts I, II and III
description: Romance, travel, and a portal to another world of fascinating and steamy encounters! Come explore with a couple as they go on the adventure of a lifetime. From an exotic island vacation, they delve into a magical world of beauty, desire and true emotion... If you enjoy science fiction and fantasy with real heat and a little humor, you will enjoy this romp!
author: Eleanor Lambert
